parameters.name: InstanceIds
parameters.description: The instance IDs of the cloud services to which the check items belong.

parameters.name: InstanceTypes
parameters.description: The asset types of cloud services.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: Vendors
parameters.description:
The cloud service providers. Valid values:

*   **ALIYUN**: Alibaba Cloud
